tool_description: Botometer® checks Twitter accounts for possibly automated activity.
name: Botometer Pro
title: Botometer Pro

api_list.name: Check accounts in bulk
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://botometer-pro.p.rapidapi.com/litev1/check_accounts_in_bulk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "botometer-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
